hiveArticle.title: a beautiful trail running race in Loutraki,Greece-Gerania Vertical Kilometer
hiveArticle.body:
Hello,

Every September happens a nice event in Loutraki,Greece...
Gerania Vertical Kilometer trail race.
The starting line of the course is by the sea and the finishing line is on the top of the mountain(Gerania).
The distance of the course is only 6 kilometers,but it's a continuously  hard uphill and 1 kilometer is vertical..
i want to share with you some pictures of this beautiful place...
